SmProcessing

Class TrendRemovalProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • SmProcessing.TrendRemovalProcess

  • public class TrendRemovalProcess
extends java.lang.Object
    This class removes any pre-event mean from the acceleration array, then integrates to velocity, looks for a trend in velocity and removes the derivative of the trend from the acceleration array. This corrected acceleration array is then integrated to also return a corrected velocity array.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TrendRemovalProcess(int startInd, boolean fftint)
      Constructor simply initializes variables.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getPreEventMean()
      getter for the pre-event mean
      int getTrendRemovalOrder()
      getter for the trend removal order
      double[] removeTrends(double[] accel, double dtime)
      Performs the trend removal steps of pre-event mean removal from acceleration, integration to velocity, trend detection in velocity, differentiation of trend and removal of trend derivative from acceleration, then integration of acceleration to corrected velocity

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrendRemovalProcess

        public TrendRemovalProcess(int startInd,
                           boolean fftint)
        Constructor simply initializes variables.
        Parameters:
        startInd - the event start index
        fftint - flag for freq integration

    • Method Detail

      • removeTrends

        public double[] removeTrends(double[] accel,
                             double dtime)
                      throws SmException
        Performs the trend removal steps of pre-event mean removal from acceleration, integration to velocity, trend detection in velocity, differentiation of trend and removal of trend derivative from acceleration, then integration of acceleration to corrected velocity
        Parameters:
        accel - acceleration array, this array is modified during processing and will contain the corrected acceleration after the call.
        dtime - the sampling rate in seconds per sample
        Returns:
        the corrected velocity array
        Throws:
        SmException - if unable to remove differentiated trend from acceleration

      • getPreEventMean

        public double getPreEventMean()
        getter for the pre-event mean
        Returns:
        the pre-event mean that was removed from acceleration

      • getTrendRemovalOrder

        public int getTrendRemovalOrder()
        getter for the trend removal order
        Returns:
        the order of the polynomial trend removed from acceleration
